text: Mana nikhumufimbulila mbu; “Kasia eliaro, embeli wetsimoni tsiefu nende obufimbuli kho olwa likhuwa liefu liliula,(eshialo nishitsula amatsi) awo winjisie buli tsimbia tsibili tsibili. Nende Abandu bobo halali ulia owelikhuwa lilie liamala okhubura, mbu oyo yakhasishe, kho olaboola ninasi khubalia abakholela obubii emioyo chiabu tawe. Toto abo balasishibwa.’’
